titles.title: Digital Television Transition Consumer Relief Act of 2008
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on digital-to-analog converter boxes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
7/10/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on digital-to-analog converter boxes, and for other purposes.
